keyword: calories in a medium pizza dominos
title: Calories in a Medium Domino's Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in a medium pizza dominos, including full nutrition breakdown for a standard cheese pizza, macros, and variations like toppings.
h1: Calories in a Medium Domino's Pizza
assumptions: Medium (12-inch) Hand-Tossed Cheese Pizza with 8 slices; standard crust, sauce, and mozzarella cheese; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by crust type, toppings, location, and preparation. Domino's values are approximate; check their app or site for exact info.

quick_answer.text: A medium Domino's cheese pizza has about 1600 kcal total.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium Domino's cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 1600 kcal for the whole medium (12-inch) pizza.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a medium pizza dominos?
faqs.a: About 192 g carbs, 72 g protein, 64 g fat, with 12 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many slices in a medium Domino's pizza?
faqs.a: Typically 8 slices, with ~200 kcal per slice for cheese pizza.

faqs.q: Does crust type affect calories in a medium pizza dominos?
faqs.a: Yes; thin crust reduces by ~200 kcal, deep dish adds ~300 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a medium Domino's pizza?
faqs.a: Around 2960 mg total, mostly from cheese and sauce.
